name: Rube Goldberg Machine (nishma)
description: For my Rube Goldberg machine, I wanted to have several steps or collisions occur within the chain. I was inspired by videos I had previously watched on dominoes falling, which was always satisfying to me, so I decided to include that in my machine. I also wanted to include more than one ball (or sphere) for more movement, and that is why I built slopes (or slides) for them to gain momentum. I was not sure what the end goal should be, but then I remembered a scene from a show I watched where the characters played croquet. To mirror this, I built a sort of bridge that the last sphere would have to go through in order to complete the game. Afterwards, I also added some color and decoration for aesthetic purposes.
